review: Phenomenal product, easy to install, easy to use, exactly as advertised. That would warrant a 5-star rating.Product support: So far, Amazon's earned 0 stars. There seems to be some kind of problem with the authorization process at Amazon; my access to TV shows, movies, etc. that are "included with Prime" sometimes disappears. The only solution so far is to unplug everything (HDMI, power) from everything (TV, wall, receiver), wait a few minutes, and start over powering up and reattaching things. I'd think this was my problem alone except that other customers have experienced the same issue. The only helpful advice I received came from other customers' comments. Amazon has done nothing to correct the problem or help me find a work-around.
